mapper.select: SELECT e.emote_idx, ec.emote_color_tag, e.update_date, ecp.file_idx FROM (SELECT ANY_VALUE(emote_idx) AS emote_idx, update_date FROM (SELECT COUNT(emote_idx) AS emote_idx_count, emote_idx, update_date FROM mainfeed WHERE update_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY emote_idx , update_date ORDER BY update_date , emote_idx_count DESC) AS t1 GROUP BY update_date) AS e INNER JOIN (SELECT t3.emote_color_idx, t3.update_date, f.emote_color_tag FROM (SELECT ANY_VALUE(emote_color_idx) AS emote_color_idx, update_date FROM (SELECT COUNT(emote_color_idx) AS emote_color_count, emote_color_idx, update_date FROM mainfeed WHERE update_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY emote_color_idx , update_date ORDER BY update_date , emote_color_count DESC) t2 GROUP BY update_date) AS t3 INNER JOIN feedemotecolor f ON f.emote_color_idx = t3.emote_color_idx) AS ec ON e.update_date = ec.update_date INNER JOIN feedemotecomplete ecp ON ec.emote_color_idx = ecp.emote_color_idx AND e.emote_idx = ecp.emote_idx;
